snippet: The Giants’ leading receiver, Victor Cruz, was listed as probable for the season opener, but defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul was questionable.
abstract: New York Giants are hopeful that receiver Victor Cruz will recover from bruised heel in time for season opener against Dallas Cowboys, but defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul remains questionable.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ leading receiver, Victor Cruz, was listed as probable for the season opener, but defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul was questionable.

headline.main: Giants Hopeful About Status of Cruz but Not Pierre-Paul
headline.print_headline: Giants Hopeful About Status Of Cruz but Not Pierre-Paul
